name: Rock Climbing - 101
description: In this course, you will learn the basic skills and fundamentals of rock climbing: from learning how to secure your harness to learning basic climbing techniques. By the end of the course, you should be able to overcome more challenging routes and feel comfortable climbing with friends! Climbing gear is provided. Climber must be within 40–300 lbs. and must wear closed-toed shoes.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
